name: MESTEK Infrared Thermometer Gun, Non Contact Digital Laser Thermometer Temperature Gun with Color LCD for Cooking, Home Repairs, Humidity Measurement, Adjustable Emissivity -58°F to 1472°F(-50~800°C)
short_description: 【HIGH ACCURACY】-Non-contact laser measurement & K probe contact measurement with13 Points Laser Guidance and adjustable emissivity (0.1-1.0) for more accurate measurement.French HTU20 temperature sensor and laser head are used to display the ambient temperature/humidity, dew point,spoilage temperature, surface and interior temperature of the object at the same time

【WIDE APPLICATIONS】The IR thermometer for surface temperature measurement,like cooking, baking, BBQ, frozen food, fried food, vehicle repairing, home maintenance,DIY helper, planting, wine making, pool, fire monitoring,Industry, household appliances, cats toy, adapter etc.Temperature readings from this temp gun are inanimate objects, the measured temperature for humans or animals will be inaccurate
